Activity: Log in to the system, check emails. Check out the recent discussions on Reddit about game development. Maybe contribute to a thread or two.
Continue researching movement techniques in similar games. Focus on specific techniques like vaulting, climbing, and swimming.
Research the implementation of wall running mechanics. Understand how wall running is implemented.
Look into the nuances of implementing a sprint mechanic, consider field of vision changes when sprinting.
Refine and expand the research document with new findings. Categorize the movement techniques based on their complexity and feasibility for our project.

Create a separate document outlining the potential risks and challenges associated with implementing each movement technique. Consider factors like development time, performance impact, and design complexity.

Discuss research findings with @lpro-1 and @ldes-1. Share the research document and gather feedback on which movement techniques to prioritize for prototyping. (Email: Subject: Movement Research Findings and Prioritization).
Commit the changes to the version control system (Git). Write a descriptive commit message explaining the changes made.
